Html:
Hi,

I am running audio recording in windows xp sp2, but when I run it, I got this error:


Function: BeginMonitoring(), Error: NAudio.MmException: NoDriver calling waveInGetDevCaps
   at NAudio.Wave.WaveIn.GetCapabilities(Int32 devNumber)
   at VoiceRecorder.Audio.AudioRecorder.BeginMonitoring()

For more information, see Help and Support Center at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/events.asp.

 

is NAudio not compatible with windows xp, or there might be other issue?
NAudio is compatible with XP. What device number are you using? Your computer may not have a microphone perhaps?
